text:
During import of example document of default publication:

Exception during commit or rollback:
org.apache.cocoon.components.search.IndexException: message: (see logfiles for
details)

after document added but no result by search
creator: a.ronca@indire.it

text:
(In reply to comment #0)

Same here under Windows XP. Trying to submit a document in the workflow overview
causes the same exception.
creator: mangst@inventec.ch

text: Works for me. Have you updated and done a clean build?
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
